backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report JSON containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to their human‑written summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and theme settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML app entry with Inter font, jsPDF CDN, metadata, and root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the MiningHub PDF generator page as the main application view.
frontend/src/content/mininghubPlan.ts: Typed data model and full MiningHub investment plan content including Hindi copy, plan values, mining explainer, and PDF text labels.
frontend/src/features/calculator/incomeC: Utility functions to compute monthly income and total income including team and level rewards.
frontend/src/features/pdf/downloadPdf.ts: Triggers browser download of a PDF Blob via a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/features/pdf/generateMining: Creates a multi‑section investment plan PDF using jsPDF with images, layout logic, and MiningHub data.
frontend/src/features/pdf/loadPdfImageAs: Loads local images as base64 strings for PDF embedding using canvas conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and refreshes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity authentication context and provider handling login, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and global CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global typography/background styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/MiningHubPdfGenerator: Renders the MiningHub PDF generator UI, showing plan details and triggering PDF creation and download.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors using CSS variables, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, implemented features, and requirements related to generating a styled MiningHub PDF.
